thread.title: Dimitar Berbatov was a pundit for Fulham vs Tottenham - and Twitter was obsessed with him wearing EYELINER
thread.title_full: Dimitar Berbatov was a pundit for Fulham vs Tottenham - and Twitter was obsessed with him wearing EYELINER

author: Jim Daly
title: Dimitar Berbatov was a pundit for Fulham vs Tottenham - and Twitter was obsessed with him wearing EYELINER
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Dimitar Berbatov returned to our screens on Sunday as a pundit for F ulham and Tottenham's FA Cup clash . 
The mercurial Bulgarian striker played for both teams of course but hasn't featured on British TV for a few years. 
However judging by the reaction on Twitter to his inclusion in the BBC Sport studio at Craven Cottage, football's coolest man remains a firm favourite with football fans in the UK. And the thing that most fans were obsessed with ... was Berbatov's smouldering eyes... Some we're taken in by his eyebrows Other people were just struck by Berbatov's beauty... And some just couldn't hide their love for the great man 
To be honest, Berbatov is a beautiful man and can do whatever he wants. Rock that eyeliner, Dimi, you look fabulous, bitch. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
